scripts.prep: npm run clean && copyfiles analytics.js dist && concat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js node_modules/marked/marked.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.build-html: copyfiles index.html tour.html images/* uploads/* dist
scripts.watch-html: concat index.html -o dist/index.html && concat tour.html -o dist/tour.html
scripts.build-js: npm run copy-polyfill & browserify src/playground.ts -p [tsify] -o dist/bundle.js & browserify src/tour.ts -p [tsify] -o dist/tour.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify src/playground.ts -p [tsify] -v --debug -o dist/bundle.js & watchify src/tour.ts -p [tsify] -v --debug -o dist/tour.js
scripts.babel-js: babel dist/bundle.js --out-file dist/bundle.js & babel dist/tour.js --out-file dist/tour.js
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run babel-js && npm run build-md && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run build-csv
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run build-md" "npm run watch-js" "npm run build-css" "npm run build-html" "npm run watch-csv"
